units.title: Lentiviral delivery of inducible CRE and dual sgRNA cassette
units.text: neered a lentiviral vector to deliver 4-hydroxytamoxifen-inducible CRE and a dual single-guide RNA (sgRNA) cassette (Fig. 1a).
units.rationale: Enables controlled CRISPR perturbations in organoids.

units.title: Design of dual sgRNA construct
units.text: The dual sgRNA consists of two sgRNAs targeting the same gene, expressed under the U6 or H1 promoter.
units.rationale: Ensures simultaneous targeting of a single gene.

units.title: Reporter assay for gRNA efficiency
units.text: In this assay, a pre-assembled array of gRNA-targeting sequences fused with TagBFP is used to generate interneurons with lateral ganglionic eminence (LGE) origin (LGE-IN; MEIS2) or caudal ganglionic eminence (CGE) origin (CGE-IN; NR2F2) into the reporter cell lines by lentiviruses.
units.rationale: Allows measurement of gRNA activity via fluorescent tagging.

units.title: Evaluation of genome editing via BFP loss
units.text: Successful genome editing causes frameshift mutations, resulting in the loss of protein (BFP) fluorescence, which enables the quantitative evaluation of gRNA efficiency (Fig. 1c and Extended Data Fig. 1b,c).
units.rationale: Provides a quantitative readout of editing success.

units.title: Construction of lentiviral plasmid library
units.text: We individually cloned sgRNA pairs and pooled them equally to construct a lentiviral plasmid library (Extended Data Fig. 3a,b).
units.rationale: Creates a diverse library for pooled screening.

units.title: Limiting lentiviral integration to one per cell
units.text: To ensure that lentiviral integration frequency was limited to one per cell, we used a low infection rate of 2.5% (ref. 18) (Extended Data Fig. 3c–e).
units.rationale: Prevents multiple integrations that could confound results.

units.title: Barcoding individual lentiviral integrations
units.text: We introduced a unique clone barcode (UCB; 1.4 × 10^7 combinations) for each dual sgRNA cassette to label individual lentiviral integration events (Fig. 1a and Extended Data Fig. 4a,b).
units.rationale: Enables tracking of each perturbation clone.

units.title: Bulk genomic DNA extraction from organoid pools
units.text: Using this strategy, we obtained an average of 2,770 bulk-extracted genomic DNA from organoid pools of four different embryoid bodies (Fig. 1e).
units.rationale: Provides material for downstream sequencing and clone analysis.

units.title: Induction of eCas9 in embryoid bodies
units.text: eCas9 was induced in 5-day-old embryoid bodies, followed by neural induction.
units.rationale: Activates CRISPR editing at a defined developmental stage.

units.title: FACS analysis of clone size
units.text: Fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS)-based analyses we found a mean average cell number per clone of 4.4 (Extended Data Fig. 4e,f).
units.rationale: Quantifies the contribution of each clone to the organoid.
